main event: On October 6, 1953, a citizen of Harrisville, Michigan, reported sighting an unknown flying object traveling in a generally southward direction.
interesting points: The object was described as a brilliant light or a semiballoon-like craft with a slightly rounded appearance,The sighting lasted for approximately 6 to 7 seconds,The object was at an altitude of about 20,000 feet and disappeared from sight without any sound,Local radar did not detect any targets corresponding to the sighted object,Weather conditions were clear with visibility of twenty to thirty miles.
sighted object: unknown flying object appearing as a brilliant light
